rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Wide entry with a vestibule and storage closet for footwear. The design incorporates Chettinad motifs with traditional stone and wood accents.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the main facade to allow abundant natural light, designed in a modern interpretation of Chettinad style. Traditional elements such as carved wood detailing and vibrant colors are used.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with integrated storage and efficient layout adhering to local building norms, including a small dining area attached to the living room.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom on the ground floor featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, built-in wardrobes, and subtle Chettinad decor accents. Vastu alignment ensures a peaceful environment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with traditional design elements and access to a small balcony for ventilation.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space designed with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. The room incorporates large windows for ample light while maintaining privacy using Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Solely dedicated home office space on the ground floor with a view to the outdoors via floor-to-ceiling windows. The design ensures minimal distractions and adherence to ergonomic standards.
